com.colofabrix.mathparser.struct.builders

Class ExpressionWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.colofabrix.mathparser.struct.builders.ExpressionWorker

  • public final class ExpressionWorker
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of various methods to work with Expressions.

    This class contains various method to do common tasks with expressions, like conversion from strings and packing from one type to another

    Author:
    Fabrizio Colonna

    • Method Detail

      • fromExpression

        public static CmplxExpression fromExpression(java.util.List<Expression> stack,
                             Context context)
                                      throws ExpressionException
        Creates a CmplxExpression starting from a list of Expression

        The method splits the string in its component and create an appropriate Expression for every token.

        Parameters:
        stack - A stack of Expression to add in a new CmplxExpression
        context - A reference to the used context
        Returns:
        A CmplxExpression object containing the added CmplxExpression(s)
        Throws:
        ExpressionException

      • fromExpression

        public static CmplxExpression fromExpression(java.lang.String expression,
                             Context context)
                                      throws ExpressionException
        Creates a CmplxExpression starting from a string

        The method splits the string in its component and create an appropriate Expression for every token.

        Parameters:
        expression - The expression to converts
        context - A reference to the used context
        Returns:
        A CmplxExpression object containing the translated string expression
        Throws:
        ExpressionException

      • fromWord

        public static Expression fromWord(java.lang.String word,
                  Context context)
                           throws ExpressionException
        Creates an instance of Expression to hold an entry

        This builder starts from a single string entry, a single token like a number or an operator, and creates the right Expression object

        Parameters:
        word - The name of the variable or the number to store in the object
        Returns:
        A new Expression to hold the specified variable or number
        Throws:
        ExpressionException

      • packExpression

        public static CmplxExpression packExpression(Expression input)
        It packs the given Expression in the appropriate form inside a CmplxExpression
        Parameters:
        input - The Expression entry to pack
        Returns:
        A CmplExpression object containing an equivalent form of input

      • unpackExpression

        public static Expression unpackExpression(CmplxExpression input)
        Clean a CmplxExpression
        Parameters:
        input - A complex expression to be cleaned
        Returns:
        An object of type Expression containing a cleaned CmplxExpression
